title: Bonnaroo Freestyle (2015)
lyrics: Bonaroo, how y'all feelin'?
This side- This side the loudest, you know what I'm sayin'
I'm gon' kick something like this [?][4:28]
Ah, ah, ah, ah
I said right now it's me and my homie Chance the Rapper
Freestylin' and nobody count after
Nobody compete, y'all weak
This is more than us, an athlete
This is rhymes on stage, this is a rage
This not a party, this is a parade
I pass it to my homeboy Chance
Give it to 'em with ya homeboy man
Damn, I'm on the stage with Earth, Wind & Fire
Gotta spit fire, rapper for hire
Hangin' out with Kendrick Lamar, Chicago
Like y'all go on my shows, I feel like [?]
I be rappin' off the top, I know I'm a star
How I end at Bonnaroo, we ain't goin' too far
I got a Super Jam to bond with, you feel like Chicago
This the place you wanna end up, Bonnaroo make some noise!
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Make music, hey!
Save music, hey!
Uh-huh
One, two-
I said this side got's to be lava
This side right here got to be fire
This side right here cannot defy ya
That side might have to retire
Rhymes don't stop, straight off the top
R&B with 2005 hip-hop
Make some noise right now, number one
Number one, number one
Uh-huh, one (Yeah, yeah)
Chance the Rapper, on they turf
'Fore I pass the rock when I rock with Surf
I'm feelin' like I could use a shirt
But if I got a couple words I could use a verb
Livin' in a Big Ben, it's big Chance
With my big bands, we ridin' Pimp A Butterfly
When I'm ridin' through I feel like I could [?]
I can never, never die, rappin' with my circle rock
Feelin' like a samurai off the top of the tippy
I'm feelin' like I'm a hippy
I used to be super trippy
Now I'm feelin' musical
I be hangin' with my homie, that's how music go!
(Oh, oh)
And that's the music flow
And if you with me right now, homie now ya know
I said we talkin' bout Surf, talkin' 'bout K Dot
Knowin' we rule the Earth, talkin' about hip-hop
Talkin' this non-stop, talkin' that real rock
Talkin' right from Chicago, L.A. the top
Make some mothafuckin' noise in this bitch
Cause you know I don't stop, this is great as it get! (Noise)
Ayy, Ayy
Hey
One, two, three, make some noise
Uh, uh, uh, uh
Uh, uh, uh, uh
Uh, uh, uh, uh
Hey
Yes, sir
